title: PRIDE ON THE SEA LAUNCHES 5-DAY LGBTQIA INCLUSIVE BERMUDA BASH CRUISE
text:
PRIDE ON THE SEA LAUNCHES 5-DAY LGBTQIA INCLUSIVE BERMUDA BASH CRUISE
July 22, 2015 - Washington, DC -- Setting sail on its maiden voyage, Pride on the Sea offers the most unique, first of its kind lesbian, gay, bisexual, transgender, queer, intersex and ­straight ally (LGBTQIA) cruising experience called Bermuda Bash. The five-day, 1900-person Bermuda Bash cruise will depart on August 27, 2016, from the Baltimore Harbor to Kings Warf, Bermuda.
With the historic June 26th, 2015, Supreme Court ruling recognizing marriage equality as a fundamental right guaranteed by the Fourteenth Amendment to the United States Constitution, we are at a pivotal point for LGBTQIA inclusion, alliance and understanding in our country.
Pride on the Sea cruises are intended to build trust, community and improve the working & social relationships through all ethnicities, genders, sexual orientations & identifications and the communities they represent through our program tracks and special events. The Bermuda Bash cruise is centered on the LGBTQIA community and a core set of values: personal responsibility, community responsibility, respect, and trust & consent. These are values that every staff person, cruise participant, company and organization involved supports and is carried all the way from planning through implementation and evaluation of our events and productions. The cruise will also highlight 6 tracks of programs which include: mind, body and soul, political empowerment and community development, professional and networking events, sass and flirt, entertainment and culture, as well as nightlife and themed events.
Starting with a culture of inclusion, alliance and understanding, Pride on the Sea is currently seeking specific key community members, entertainers, affinity groups, companies and organizations that they feel embrace this culture about possible partnership opportunities with the Bermuda Bash cruise
 “Whether attending our events as a party vacation, a professional/community continuing education resource or a romantic honeymoon, there will truly be something for everyone at the Bermuda Bash, and that’s exactly our point. At Pride on the Sea we aim to create unique experiences that embrace all identities and passions of every person that steps foot in our events,” Howard N. Cromwell, President & Founder, Pride on the Sea.
To learn more about Pride on the Sea, Bermuda Bash or to become a partner, please visit www.prideonthesea.com .

About Pride on the Sea:
Pride on the Sea cruises and events are diverse and fully inclusive of all genders, sexual orientations & identifications. Pride on the Sea prides itself on being different from many other cruising experiences by focusing on building an all inclusive LGBTQI & Ally community. We are a company that works to ensure that everyone at all of our events feels comfortable to just be themselves. PRIDE, however you self identify, is what we’re all about at Pride on the Sea.
